DOC.brief_summary: To determine the amount of voriconazole in the brain after 2 loading doses and 3 maintenance doses over 3 days and compare it to the amount of voriconazole in the plasma.
DOC.brief_title: To Determine The Amount Of Voriconazole In The Brain After 2 Loading Doses And 3 Maintenance Doses Over 3 Days
DOC.criteria: Subjects must be willing and able to provide informed consent. Subjects must be willing and able to be confined at the Clinical Research Unit as required by the protocol. Subjects with any condition affecting drug absorption.
